name: Fractal Mascot
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Relative Density
entries: The fractal can move through creatures and objects as if they were {@quickref difficult terrain||3}. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

action.name: Quantum Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) force damage, or 6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) force damage if the fractal is Medium or bigger.
